documents.document: @BlockaDutton Chris, is the CT sports podcast happening this year?

@whiskeycully met him st the Brumbies HQ at a kid clinic. A gentle giant
@steve_l15 A year too late for the scots

@jmilner1956 @CanbTimesSport Christian100 percent
